entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:10 p.m. EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
